  results <- readRDS(test)
  r2 <- plyr::ldply(results, function(r){
    as.data.frame(r[-5])
  })
  r2$status <- ifelse(r2$status == ":smile:", "&#9989;", "&#x274C;")
  r2 <- cbind(id = seq_along(r2$name), r2)
  knitr::kable(r2, format = 'markdown')
}
